name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Albert T. GREY, Jr., Appellant

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Albert T. GREY, Jr., Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Cecil B. Moore, Philadelphia, for appellant.
F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, James J. Wilson, Deborah E. Glass, Asst. Dist. Attys., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
374 A.2d 974
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Albert T. GREY, Jr., Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 15, 1977.
Decided June 22, 1977.
Cecil B. Moore, Philadelphia, for appellant.
F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, James J. Wilson, Deborah E. Glass, Asst. Dist. Attys., for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
